summary: The BuildRequest contains no requirements or acceptance criteria. The diff modifies backend and frontend code to support/handle blob storage-backed image gallery operations (list/upload/delete) and adds UI/error handling and documentation updates, which were not explicitly requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend actor updated to include a blob-storage mixin module (MixinStorage) for blob storage functionality.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified in the BuildRequest, so any implemented feature is beyond the stated scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Frontend gallery grid enhanced with loading/empty/error states, backend-missing-method detection messaging, and a retry button.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Gallery item card adds download and delete actions with confirmation dialog and inline error UI for deletion.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: React Query hooks implemented/modified for listing images (listBlobs + getBlob), uploading (storeBlob), deleting (deleteBlob), and improved error handling for missing backend methods.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Additional frontend changes referenced in summaries: global styling updates, runtime config documentation, header/footer, uploader UX, custom domain and deployment docs, Tailwind config updates, backend TypeScript type definitions, and a storage recovery alert component.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified in the BuildRequest; these changes are unrequested relative to the empty spec.
